text: Hello. Have you heard of Save the Children?
Hello, how are you?
Good ,thanks, how are you this evening?
I'm doing good.  I think I have heard of Save the Children but I am not familiar with it.
This is their website  URL  they place a very high value on ensuring children have food to eat
I see.  It does seem they are a well known organization and provide charitable efforts worldwide.
Yes, they offer a wide range of ways to help children, did you grow up with enough resources?
Yes, I did grow up with enough resources.  I am currently looking at the site a bit more.
That is good to hear,and you were blessed,I grew up poor and many times we never had dinner to eat
Wow, sorry to hear.  Hope you are doing well these days.
Thank you, yes much better and I have a daughter that I keep well taken care of, and she I let her know she is blessed
That is good.  So do you take part in Save the Children in any way?
Yes,I have donated money quite a few times, I trust them
I see.  I'm guessing they accept charitable donations through their website?
Yes they do, Would you be interested in contributing to a child's better life?
Sure thing. I will donate.  I have sort of a tight budget but I will donate $1.
ok, that is so kind of you they research team will forward all funds
sounds good. any other ways I can help in a non-monetary capacity?
Their website has ways of contacting them,and they will answer any questions you have, I am not certain and do not want to give misinformation
Ok, I see. Yes, I guess I can find any information I need on their website.  Thanks.
